abilityEffect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. Each of your Active Pokémon's type is [D] until the end of your turn. If that Pokémon is no longer your Active Pokémon, this effect ends.

effect.en: If your opponent has 6 or more cards in his or her hand, discard a number of cards without looking until your opponent has 5 cards left in his or her hand.
